problem_text:
Suppose that a finite group G admits a factorization G = AB = BC = CA, where A, B, C are abnormal supersoluble subgroups. Is G supersoluble?
A. F. Vasil’ev, T. I. Vasil’eva
answer: Yes, it is (L. S. Kazarin, V. N. Tyutyanov, Preprint, 2023 (Russian), https://kourovkanotebookorg.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/d09ad0bed183d180d0bed0b2d0bad0b0-19.100-5.pdf).
